title: sukha vazhi tanai
sahitya:
sukha vazhi tanai ari manamE adait-toDarndu nil anudinamE


anupallavi

  tagavazhiyAdu nI dharmattaip-pENAi sanmArgam sATriDum sAdhanam pUNAi


caraNam    iraivanai maravAdE Igaiyait-turavAdE enda nal uyirkkum tondaravu tarAdu
kuraigaLai muraiyiTTu nirai perat-tirundiDu kuncitapada nizhal viDukoNDirundiru
    caraNam 2    kalviyai dinamtOrum karuttuDan vaLarttiDu kaTra vazhi naDandu shoTravarAdiru
selvaghait-tozhilgaLai kSEmamAip-payiriDu dEsha nalattirkkOr sEvaiyai muyanriDu
    caraNam 3    uDalinai oDukkAdE ulaginai verukkAdE uTravarukk-iyanra udaviyai marukkAdE
kaDavuLai marakkAdE kaDamaiyait-turakkAdE kATraiyum kadiraiyum pOTRAmal irukkAdE
    caraNam 4    puNNiya sheyalgaLaip-paNNap-pin vAngAdE pullarin koDumaiyaip-pOkkAdu tUngAdE
tiNNiya dhIranAit-tyAga buddhiyuDanE sheivana sheidiDin jayamunat-tAngumE
    caraNam 5    pulangaLai aDakki nI podu vazhi ninriDu pUraNa yOgiyAi bhuviyinai venriDu
phalangaLirp-paTrinrip-paNigaLaip-purindiDu pArvai uLLAkkiyE paramanai ninaittiDu
